column20: . Intellectuals to be discussed include Antonio Gramsci, Frantz Fanon, Leopold Senghor, MK Gandhi, Rabindranath Tagore, Edward Said, Gayatri Spivak, and Paul Gilroy. Reading list available from Faculty website. Those readings that are more difficult to obtain will be available to photocopy from the Faculty Library before the start of term.
